headline: J. B. Hunt Transport Services, Inc. Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: LOWELL, Ark., January 23, 2025--J.B. Hunt Transport Services, Inc. (NASDAQ:JBHT) announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a regular quarterly dividend on its common stock of $ 0.44 (forty four cents) per common share, which is a 2.3% increase over the previous quarterly dividend. The dividend is payable to stockholders of record on February 7, 2025 and will be paid on February 21, 2025.
